snippet.title: Songs of Silence - Early Access Launch Trailer | Art Nouveau-inspired Fantasy Strategy Game
snippet.description:
Songs of Silence is an Art Nouveau-inspired turn-based strategy game with a unique mix of turn-based kingdom management, hero development and real-time combat.

🗓️ coming on November 13th, 2024 to PC, PlayStation and Xbox

🟠 Steam – https://store.steampowered.com/app/2195410/Songs_Of_Silence/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=ea&utm_term=2024&utm_content=sos-ea-launch-native
🔵 PlayStation – https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011866/
🟢 Xbox – https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/songs-of-silence/9nlz55vqrpgn

🎮 Epic 4X fantasy strategy game 
⚔️Fast-paced, tactical gameplay
🎨 Art Nouveau-inspired visuals 
👥 Multiplayer support for up to 5 players
🌍 A rich world filled with stories and secrets 
🎼 An epic soundtrack by Hitoshi Sakimoto (Final Fantasy Tactics) 

📜 Learn more at https://songs-of-silence.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=ea&utm_term=2024&utm_content=sos-launch-native
📰 Press Kit – https://impress.games/press-kit/rcp/songs-of-silence

We've been working on this project for four years, and it's been an adventurous journey to work with such a diverse and talented team on our approach to combine the nostalgia of strategy games we know from our childhood, with a fresh and dynamic approach. 

We dived deep into the artistic path, painting the world in a style inspired by art nouveau, reflected on our beautifully crafted maps and unit designs. We managed to create a game with deep single-player campaign, a skirmish with single- and multiplayer modes to play with your friends.

Thank you all so much for your support so far, and we're looking forward to the future. Our journey has just begun - and we're excited to see which path you will take in Songs of Silence.
